name: FNiagaraAssetTagDefinition
doc: An Asset Tag Definition defines a tag that can be added to various Niagara assets for sorting & filtering purposes.

AssetTag: The Display Name used for this tag.
AssetFlags: Select the asset types this tag can apply to. This is used to hide tags that can never apply for a given type.
Description: Further explanation of what this tag is about.
DisplayType: Whether this tag should be shown directly or in the drop down for additional filters.
Color: The color used in UI to represent this tag.
